Lines.Text: Use the WASD button to-
Don't tell what to do!...W-WOAH! Could've warned me about that log!
Autopilot is engaged. Authorizing self-evasion and shooting!
MUAHAHAHA! Let's show them our GUNS!
Enemy detected!
Get out the guns...GET OUT THE GUNS!
Use the LMB to shoot!
Use the RT to shoot!
I know what to do, Timmy. I know! I know!
What the heck are they building in my backyard!
Watch out for those...ARTILLERY STRIKES!
Approaching enemy TUNNEL!
HEEERE WE COOOME!
Woooaaah...pretty lights!
Woah! What's this supposed to be? A bad rip-off of TRON!?
Hmmm...This place is quiet...too quiet.
Ooh La Lah! More action!
I don't think they like what you said, Prof!
What the heck, Timmy! It's been raining in my backyard!
Ooh! W-we have multiple signals incoming!
Let's get 'em all!
That's it, Prof! The one that's shooting all the artillery strikes!
Nooooo!
*groan* I'm getting tired of these things!
Hey, Prof! That tunnel looks ENTICING!
And awaaay we GOOO!
Aaaahaha!
Aha! We're in the sphincter now, Timmy!
Err, Prof...We should get outta here!
They're onto us!
Get out? We're gonna get in! Sphincter 2, Electric Boogaloo!
Wha-? How many underground cities are there!?
I wanna go home, Professor! We should get outta here!
Haha, finally! We're at the end of the tunnel!
Ahaha! We did it, Professor!
Hey, How did you think I did? Pretty great, huh?
Ah...forget it! Just charge the weapon and use it when I say so!
Confirmation required.
Yes confirmed!
2nd Confirmation required.
YES...confirmed!
3rd Confirma-
JUST CHARGE THE DANG WEAPON, TIMMY!
...okay...
Oh! Now we got laser enemies? Shoot the laser at them, now!
Ah, more enemies…Thanks for giving them a heads up, Timmy!
Me? Your'e the one that programmed me!
Yeah, yeah...Whatever.
As far as I know, my miscalculations...are YOUR miscalculations!
Great! Not only could you not follow instructions…now you couldn't even give a detection warning, Timmy?!
Is it that hard to do what you are PROGRAMMED to do!?
Are you still not talking to me?
C'mon Timmy! Stop being a lil' shrew! We gotta find the core! Blow up these non-believers!
No...
Fine! I'll find it myself! Hmph!
<unintelligible noise>...Aaand we're lost.
C'mon, I could reaaally use that detection of yours, Timmyyy.
Didn't you say, you will find it yourself?
Oh c'mon Timmy! You're my lil' buddy, aren'tcha?
Fine...just straight ahead. You know…it ain't a complex place to begin with…
Are you sure this is the way to the core, huh, Timmy?
YES, I’M SURE! I thought you could count on me on this?
Of COURSE…of course, yeah!…Of course...of course...sheesh…
Woah! That must be the core!
Woah, they’re really pulling all the stops here! There are even explosive enemies!... wait a minute…
Really...
Woah, shoots! This place is totally falling apart! We gotta get outta here, Timmy!
Look, it's the exit! Let's get out before it's too laaate!
Look, it's that fool that destroyed my voice mod!
We're gonna get crushed if we stay any longer, Professor!
Fine! It's probably gonna get destroyed along with these wussies anyways!
Hoowee! We've finally paid them back for what they did to your Square Earth...thesis!
I wish I could've plundered some of these alien tech, though!
Uh oh!
Hey, it's back!
Let's get' em!
Nooo!
Hahaha! Worry not! Artillery doesn't work in the sky!
Look, we damaged it! Keep it up!
Woah, its pulling all the stops isnt it? Wh…what kinda interdimensional japanese mechanical cat wannabe baloney is this?
Haha! Look, Timmy! He's wide open! Let's finish this now!
That's great! Just keep shooting!
Oh no...this can't be good!
I'm losing control, Timmy!
W-What! It's alive!? W-w-wait, hold up! He's looking way more dangerous than before!
You mean those big...guns?
Nonono, Timmy! The lights!
Huh?
<crash noise>
...W-woah...a-are we dead...?
Did we die?
Is...Is thAt thE gAteS oF HeAveN?
Oh nO, TimMy! We'rE LocKeD oUt oF HeAvEn! We'Re GoiNg tO HeLL!
WaiT! M-my vOiCemOd! WhaT HapPeNed tO iT?
LoOk...T-ThAt BiG tHiNg- LoOk At WhaT iT diD tO mY vOiCEmOd, TimMY!
I dOn'T feEL goOd wiThOut mY VoiCeMod, Tim-
Scanning...uploading data analysis...
We are currently Three Thousand, Two Hundred metres...underground.
We are very small, Professor!
What is my default unit scal-
ThAt doeSn't MatTer! LoOk at You, TimMy!
You LoOk HorRibLE!
Oooh...Aaah...The paaain!
YoU doN't fEeL AnY PaiN!
Ah haha!
But, Professor, we don't have a chance against something that BIG!
We don't have enough firepower!
NonoNoNOnoNo!
ThiS iS nOt oVER yeT! PuLL oUt tHE ScheMatiCS, TiMmy!
We nEeD tO briNG oUr A-GamE!
FIREPOWER!
<construction noises>
2 Hours Later...
Phew! I think we got this, Timmy! Let's test this out, BABY!
Weapon Charging...Charging Complete...
Initiating Testing Sequence in-
Timmy! We're not off the ground!
<explosion>
Ammo Depleted...
What!?
Professor, Gates of Heaven...open!
Timmy, the enemies will hear that MILES AWAY!
My calculations didn't consider these factors...
...oops
Why didn't you listen to me, Timmy!
But, didn't you say to test it out?
On my mark! Not straight away!
I'm sick of this! You explicitly said-
I explicitly said...
